description: 22.5W Fast Charging: Boosted speed ensures rapid charging, minimizing downtime for your devices, 10000mAh Battery Capacity: Charges iPhone 15 (2.4x), OnePlus Nord 4 (2.9x), and Galaxy S24 (2.05x), Multiple Charging Ports: Micro USB, Type-C, and USB output ports for simultaneous charging, Advanced Protection: Built-in overcharge and overvoltage protection layers, Weight: 165 g, Capacity: 10000 mAh, Lithium Polymer Battery, Type-C and Type-A Connector, Power Source: USB, Charging Cable Included.
